pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partially Observed Integrated Functional Depth // Integrated Functional Depth for Partially Observed Functional Data and applications to visualization, outlier detection and classification. It implements the methods proposed in: Elas, A., Jimnez, R., Paganoni, A. M. and Sangalli, L. M., (2023), "Integrated Depth for Partially Observed Functional Data", Journal of Computational and Graphical Statistics, doi:10.1080/10618600.2022.2070171. Elas, A., Jimnez, R., Shang, H. L. (2023), "Depth-based reconstruction method for incomplete functional data", Computational Statistics, doi:10.1007/s00180-022-01282-9. Elas, A., Nagy, S. (2024), "Statistical properties of partially observed integrated functional depths", TEST, doi:10.1007/s11749-024-00954-6.
